titleStmt.title: The fantasies of a troubled mannes head.
titleStmt.author: Canand, J.
B. G. (Bernard Garter).

publicationStmt.publisher: Without Aldersgate in little Brittaine, by A. Lacy,

notesStmt.note: Includes 4 poems; title is taken from first poem, which is signed: I.C. [i.e. J. Canand]. The other poems are: "Of euyll tounges" signed: J. Canand; "Of truth and triall" signed: B.G. [i.e. B. Garter]; and "A strife betwene Appelles and Pigmalion" signed: Ber. Gar.
"A strife betwene Appelles and Pigmalion" was formerly identified as STC 11630.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
